div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo octauo die mensis
Augusti Anno quo supra

The said day Adam fyf oftymes callit and nocht comperit till haue ansuerit till
ane borght fundin one hyme be Johne of cullane for the wranguis' Intrometting
of tua laxis pertenyng to him was inamerciament of the court becaus the said day was assignit
to hyme to ansuer' to the said borgh' be batht thar consentis Quharfor James collison'
balye chargit Androw nachtj sergeand to tak Souerte of the said Adam and warn'
him again friday that nixt cummys the xxj day of the said monetht till ansuer'
to the said borgh' / quhilk borgh' the said borg ballie be wertew of his office
continewit to the said day becaus of absence of partj and waknes of court

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The said day the prouest and balyeis ordanit Alexander Andirsone to Entir Williame
thomsone this day viij dais befor thame within the tolbutht tile ansuer'
to Johne Arthour' as he that Come Souerte tile Entir or ellis to
bring ane Sufficient testimoniale that he Is seik

The said' day James gourlay lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit tile Entir Androw Johneson'
tile ansuer' to Johne of Cullane eftir the tenor of the actis obefor et cetera tharfor
the prouest and balyeis ordanit Johne Cuk officiar' to pas' and tak ane
stres' of the siad' James and lat It Agane to borghe and It be askit and
charge him to entir the said' Androw this day viij dais And' atour the said'
Johne Cullane protestit for Costis skathtis dampnis and expensis maid' and
Sustenit tharthrow et cetera

Curia balliuorum Burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo Octauo die mensis Augustj Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day it was Sufficiently preuit be thomas lesly Dauid
fynne Androu meldrum that James colisoun' balye and William scrim
geour and Androu nacthy tua of the officiaris of the said burgh'
lauchfully warnit chargit and commandit Willliam colp personaly
apprehendit

head.add: malisoune the mastir of the kirk wark

div.p:
The said day Alexander malisoun' Offerit him reddy to deliuer
ane barrel of grilss' to the mastir of sanct nicholes kirk wark
Alexander gray quhilkis he refusit

The said' day Robert Kintor and Johne mvnk deponit be thar aithtis that
that Norman leslie come dettour to Dauy falconer of ballandrow for xiij s'
for a man callit huntar

Eodem die magister Johannes chamer fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit
magistrum Robertum masone suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem dans
et concedens eidem suum Integrum presentatem et mandatum speciale pro se et nomine
suo ad petendum exigendum et ricipiendum ab omnibus et singulis quorum
inter est omnes et singulas firmas et annuos redditus sibi debito Et de
receptis acquitandum Namandum distringendum prosequendum agendum de
feudendum ceteram omnia et singula faciendum promittens de rato et grato et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv
die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

The said day the bailyes Ordanit Johnne tailyour to bring the pot follouit be
katherin skynner one friday that nixt cumis befor thame And continewit the
oppin of the witnes to the said day

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day It was Sufficientlie preuit that the pott follouit be Katherine skynner
being in the handis of Johne talyour was the said' Katherynis pott

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die mensis Sep
tembris Anno quo supra

The said' day Johne colisone one that ane part Ande James colisone one that
vthir was oblist and bundin be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin
to stand' and abid' at the ordinance and deliuerance of Dauid menyeis of petfodellis
gilbert menyeis his sone prouest sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht and Johne of Cullane
or ony thre of thame anent the contrauersie and debat happinit betuix thame
the last Wedinsday bigane and to conuene this day eftir nowne be tua houris
or tharby in the tavarne for the finale end' and gud' of the said' matir

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta apud futy xxviij
die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The said day Dauid fynne protestit that quhat costis skaithtis and
expensis that he sustenit throue thomas colly and his schippin in
lying Idill of his bait that he may be recompensit of the said'
costis and skaithtis be the said thomas and' his schippin

The said day Androw Johnesone fischar said oppinly befor
the bailyes to Johnne cullan strek als mony borghis as
ye ples' lat se quhat mendis ye get

The said day the bailyes chargit and Ordanit Normund
lesly officiar to tak siker souerty of Androw Johnesone to
entir to Johne cullanis hous' in futy and the samyn'
and to labour witht the said Johne' bait to his proffit
eftir the tenour of the act' maid Obefor

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdenn' Tenta In pretorio burgi de Aberdenn'
secundo die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo quinto

The said day comperit Johnne of cullan In iugment befor Johhne of Ratre ane
of the baillies of the said' burgh' And producit ane Act of the court buk vppoun'
Androw Johnsoun' quhit fischear making mencioun' that the said Androw thai' suild' haue
souerte takin of him to haue Remanit in the said Johnez' hous lik as is contenit
in the said ak And' allegeit that the said Johnne of Ratre bailye had' lattin
furtht the said Androw owt of the tolbutht of his avin Autorite withtout consent of him
Tharfor the said Johnne protestit for Remeid of law tyme and place quhar It
efferit

The said day Johnne of Ratre bailye schew and allegit that thar was takin souerte
of Androw Johnnson' quhit fischear till haue Entirit within the tolbutht of Aberdene
one witsonday the last day of september till haue ansuerit at the Instance of John
of cullan quhilk day the said burgh bailye allegeit and said that the said Androw comperit
and nain comperit in his contra to follou him and maid' protestacioun' siclik as the Instrument
takin at ser Johnne stirueling notar proportis And' atour the said bailye offerit hyme that
he suld' caus' the said Androu be warnit till ony vthir day that plesit the said Johnne
till ansuer' till his chalang

The said day Willeame blytht flessour grantit hyme awand' to Sandy nory
thre hyddis sufficient merchand' gud quhilkis the baillies chargit him to pay
within terme of law

The said day Thome bride come Souerte be his hand' vphaldin to Remain with Androw
Edindeoche cordoner' And' mak leill and trew seruice quhill may that nixt cummys And'
gif he happinnis to brek to the said Androw in ony thingis for the said tyme or pas'
away fra his seruice he sall pay xxtj s' to sanct nicholes' werk vnforgevin And'
in likuis' gif the said Androu brekis to hyme and giffis hyme nocht seruice that he
sall pay siclik to sanct nicholas werk xxtj s' vnforgevin

The said day Sandy nory oblist hyme be his hand' vphaldin to deliuere
and pay to Dauid Kintor in the nayme ande behalf of Androw lowsone ane barrell
of salmond' sufficient merchand' gud within the tovne of Deip on the said Androwis
auentur And' falyeing that he deliuere nocht the said ane barrel salmond' to the said Dauid one
the behalf of the said Androu that he sall pay to hyme thre pundis scottis money
for the said barrell of salmond' at the fest of sant martin in wyntir nixt hereftir
followving within the said burgh' of Abrdene'

The said day Dauid blinseile was conuict' be thir personis ser Johnne
ruthirfurd' Johnne Colisoun' thome of leslie thome of chamer Androw
fif Duncane fyf James strathachin Androw stratoun' Robert Waus
Johnne thomsoun' Alexander malisoun' Williame Kintor Ande Duncan
Craik suorne in ane assis' ale in ane woice concordande for dissobeing
of Willeame scrimgeour officiar in the execucioun' of his office quhen'
he laide wand one hym' ffor the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the court
sic as he aucht to tyne of ande forber' in tyme to cum ande that was
gevin for dome et cetera

Curia capitalis Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio
eiusdem quinto die mensis Octobris Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo sexto

Eodem die Andreas cullane electus fuit in officium prepositure pro anno
Instante prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die thomas lesly thomas Waus Johannes collisoun' et thomas Wod
electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum dictis burgj pro anno Instante
prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Willelmus scrimgeour Normannus lesly andreas nachtj et
Johannes cuk electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum dictj burgi pro
Anno Instante prestitis solitis Juramentis

The said day the alderman bailyes counsale and communite Inquerit be the
officiaris of the said burgh' grantit and consentit to gilbert menyes
quhar' he has ane Sufficient lettir of the Commoun' clerkschip of the
said burgh' ale the said of his liwe to renewe his said lettyr and'
mak It agane to him and thomas menyeis and James menyeis his
sonnis and to the landast lovar of thame thre in dew forme witht ale
feis and proffitis pertenyng tharto or may pertene' One the souer
ast wis' cane be maid' and ordanit thar commoun' seill to be gevin
tharupone

Eodem die Johannes mar' et Johannes Ratre electi fuit decanj gilde huius
burgi pro anno Instanti prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Willelmus futhes electus fuit magister fabrice ecclesie pro anno
Instanti cum Consio et Subsidio prepositi prestito Solito Juramento

The said day alderman bailyes counsaile and communite grantit gaff
and assignit to thar familiar clerk and seruitour ser Johnne stirue
ling ane annuat pensioun' of fiwe merkis vsuale money of scotland
of the malis of thar landis of the cruvis to be rasit at tua vsuale
termes in the yeir witsonday and mertimes in wintir be evinly por
cionis for ale the dais of his liwe for his gud seruice done to thame
and ordanit to seill his lettir maid tharupoun' in dew forme as
efferis vndir thar commoun' Seill

The said day the alderman bailyes counsaill and communite grantit
assignit and gef to ser Richerd andersone bailye chaplane ane
annuat pensioun' of fiwe merkis yeirly to be rasit of thar vuyr
millis quhil he be promuvit tile ane chaplanry of fiwe pundis
withtin the paris kirk of the said burgh' for the Renunciacioun'
and ourgeving' of his richt of the chaplanry of sanct michaellis
altar situat' within the said kirk

The said day William scrimgeour normund lesly Androw nauchtj and'
Johnne cuk oblist thame be the faithtis of thar bodijs to content and'
pay to gilbert prestoun' fourty s' Ilkane of thame tene schillingis one
sanct Johnne the ewangelist day eftir yuyll And gilbert menyeis and'
Androw cullan nove alderman oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin To
pay to the said gilbert prestoun' x iij s' iiij d' at the said day

The said day the alderman bailyes counsaill and communite grantit to gilbert
prestone Androw gray free man' and' burges and' the profit to be gevin tharof
to the said gilbert for his gud seruice done thame obefor

The said day the alderman bailyes and counsaile and denis of gild' ordanit William scrimgeour
to pay to the minstir of the triniteis tene s' aucht to him of this yeir bigane And'
dischargis the said Williame of ale thingis bigane of the Rud' malis of
the said burgh' sene he Intrometit thar witht to this day for thame and
thar successouris nove and for euere

The said day the bailyes continewit the actioun' persewit be Androw Kennery
anent the awaile of his govne to preiwe the awaill of the samyn this day
viij dais

The said day ser Johne prat protestit that pro the proces' led be
ser Androw colisoune apoun' Johne thomsonis land in the vuirkirkgait
turne him to nay preiudice becaus' the said land' aw him ane merk of
Annuell in the yeir'

head.add: Anent the keping of the common seill

div.p:
The said day the aldirman bailyes counsaill and communite grantit and consentit
to giwe the half of thar commoun' seill in keping to gilbert menyeis and
deliuerit the samyne to him

The said day Androw cullan' alderman protestit that quhat burges and
free men' was maid this yeir bigane quhene he was ane of the denis
of the gilde without his consent suld turne him to nay preiudice

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister
domus sancte trinitatis de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
redditu sex s' et octo denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim debito
de quadam terra vasta quondam thome cullan Jacente in vico de le gastraw inter
terram alexander malisone ex boreali ex vna et terram dominum Andree gray capellanj
ex australi partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens Ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Dauid Syme gilberto paule textor Et ormundo lesly
sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram honestus vir Andreas lousone burgensis dicti
burgj et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu duarum marcarum
monete scocie sibi debito de quadam terra vasta Interiore Johannis malisone Jacente
in vico castrj dicti burgi ex boreali parte eiusdem inter terram thomas lesly
et andree mortymer ex occidentali et terram heredum quondam Willelmum buchan ex
orientali et terram anteriorem ipsius Johannis ex australi in defectum solucionis
dicti annuj redditus Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus thome Riddaill Johanne flessour et Johanne
cuk sergeando
Eodem die accedens ad barram venerabilis vir magister Dauid menyheis

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Andreas collison' capellanus
altarum sanctj michaelis archangeli infra ecclesiam sanctj nicholaij de Abderdene
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et octo denariorum monete
scocie de terra Johannis thomsone in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
inter terram Donaldj strathachin ex occidentali et torrentem siue aqueductum
ad molendinum superius discendena versus oriens et communionem viam regiam versus
boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o die huius
processus Testibus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Walterus blair' procurator
magistri Johannis merscheall capellanj perpetui altaris santj Ninianj de fundacione
domini de fyve et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et octo d'
monete scocie annuatim exeuntem et leuandum de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico viridi apud locum fratrum carmilitarum ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj inter
communiones vias regias versus boream austrum et occidens et terram Johannis Durvard'
versus boream et communiem venellam versus oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo fynne alexandro moresone
et Andrea nachtj seriando

The said day alderman bailyes counsaill and' communite grantit and'
assignit ale thar girssomes of thar fischingis and' landis to the bying' of
led' and' thekin of thar queir and to be disponit apone the kirkwark
to the honor of Sanct nicholes' thar glorius patrone

The said' day the ballieis continewit the actioun' persevit be Androw kennerty
anent the vaile of his et cetera to this day viij dais and ordanit the said' Androw
to bring his previs to the said' day

The said day Johne colisone grantit tile entir Johne gledstane this day
viij dais befor the aldirman and ballieis within the tolbutht tile ansuer
at the Instance of Alexander Cummyn of Cultir And' to bring him and his gudis
to the mercat Corce of abirdene for lv s' aving to the said' Alexander Cummyn
or ellis to mak him pament of the said' Some of the said' Johnez gled
stanis Rediast gudis And' the said Alexander tuk to preiwe the contrak maid'
betuix him and the said' Johne gledstane within the said' burghe

div.head: Rure manentes
div.p:
Thomas Danison amerciatur in defectu presencie
Andreas Watson' in Cullane
Alexander leitht
Robertus Danisone
Willalemus Richerdsone
thomas laysk
Walterus land
Andreas baxtar
Richardus Watsone
Dauid Andirsone
Thomas Watsone in gonellis
Alexander Sanchar' in mar'
Johannes mar in Dys'
Thomas Wodman
Johannes Wilkesone
georgius Johnesone
Dauid hay

The said' day ser Jonhne prat protestit that the proces' led' be sere Androw
Colisone one Johne thomsonis land' turne him to nay preiudice
becaus' he takis ane merk of annuele yerlie of the said' land'

The said day the aldirman and balyeis grantit that the fet chaplannis
of the college sale be pait for the haly blud' mes' of the first
malis that beis gottin of the Justice myllis
